title: Laws
description: Generates realistic-sounding fake laws from actual countries. Ideal for creative legal simulations, mock governance scenarios, or educational experiments.

response.title: All government-issued documents must be printed using carbon-neutral ink
response.description: In Sweden, government agencies are mandated to only use eco-friendly ink when printing official documents, as part of the nation's long-term climate neutrality goal.
response.penalty: Subject to administrative sanction and a fine up to SEK 15,000
